title: Gender Specificity Amid Toys
venue: International Journal of Innovative Research in Technology (IJIRT)
contributions: Explored gendered preference signals in toy selection through a structured literature-backed framing.

Supported writing, revision, and final formatting for publication submission.

title: Blockchain Interoperability Using Hash Time Locks
